Name: User
Documentation: The AWS::IAM::User type creates a user.

Parameters.Name: Groups
Parameters.Documentation: A name of a group to which you want to add the user.

Parameters.Name: LoginProfile
Parameters.Documentation: Creates a login profile so that the user can access the AWS Management Console.

Parameters.Name: ManagedPolicyArns
Parameters.Documentation: One or more managed policy ARNs to attach to this user.

Parameters.Name: Path
Parameters.Documentation: The path for the user name. For more information about paths, see Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

Parameters.Name: Policies
Parameters.Documentation:
The policies to associate with this user. For information about policies, see Overview of Policies in [Using IAM].
Note
If you specify multiple polices, specify unique values for the policy name. If you don't, updates to the IAM user will fail.
